channel.title: Paying somebody to remote onto me and make a server
channel.description:
hello,
Okay so i will be paying somebody 20-30$ to remote onto my machine and use quantum 639 server+cache +client. i will need it set up for me i already have the no ip and jdk and the port forwarding done just the the compiler sorted etc etc, if anybody feels they are up to this, will need it doing in around 30 mins from the point of u starting. post here.

item.title: Paying somebody to remote onto me and make a server
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

You cannot offer payment for services here. If you have a specific question, please post in the corresponding area of the forums.

Read full topic
item.source: Paying somebody to remote onto me and make a server

item.description:
@fpsnipmob wrote:

no… i believe its 100% free. Sorry… although im pretty sure you cant tip, but im not 100% sure on it

Read full topic
